serviceDescription: Integrate with OpenAI's advanced AI models for text-to-speech generation, audio transcription, and natural language processing tasks.

generateOpenAiSpeech.description: Generate speech using OpenAI's text-to-speech API

transcribeAudioWhisperFromURL.description: Transcribe audio from a URL using OpenAI's Whisper API

askO1Model.description: Ask a question to OpenAI's O1 model
